name: esb-csv-data
title: EAVS Section B CSV Data Standard

fields.name: ID
fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: Unique identifier for the transaction (i.e. not the voter). IDs should remain consistent, regardless of when an export is created.

fields.name: VoterID
fields.title: Voter Identifier
fields.description: Identifier that uniquely identifies a voter, but is not required to be unique within the dataset. This number must be obfuscated from the original voter identifier in the jurisdiction's registration database. This field helps analyze how effective each type of transaction is for an individual voters. In addition, if there are questions about a particular voter's transactions, an organization could provide this identifier back to the jurisdiction to glean more information about the voter's experience.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestOtherType
fields.title: Other Application Request Type
fields.description: If ApplicationRequestType fails to cover all of the possible request types for a particular voter transaction, this field specifies an alternate method by which the application request was received.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestProcessedDate
fields.title: Date Application Request Was Processed
fields.description: Specifies the date the request was processed by the local or state election official.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestReceivedDate
fields.title: Application Request Received Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the application request was received by the local or state election official.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestStatusOtherType
fields.title: Other Application Request Status Type
fields.description: If ApplicationRequestStatusType fails to cover all possible types of Application Request statuses, this field will list an alternate type.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestStatusType
fields.title: Application Request Status
fields.description: Specifies the current status of the application. Possible values are **duplicate**, which  denotes that the election official already received an application for the voter, **invalid**, which means the application was invalid, **mismatch-voter-signature**, which means the application signature did not match the voter signature on file, **missing-ssn**, denoting that the Social Security Number was missing from the application, **missing-state-id-number**, which means the state identifier was required and missing from the application, **missing-voter-signature**, meaning the voter did not sign the application, **pending**, which means the application is still being processed, **valid**, which denotes an accepted application, and **other**, which is a catch-all for any values that fall outside of the other values. Multiple values are possible for this field.

fields.name: ApplicationRequestType
fields.title: Application Request Type
fields.description: Specifies the method by which the application request was received.

fields.name: ApplicationType
fields.title: Type of Application
fields.description: Specifies the type of ballot application request. Possible values are **fpca**, which means a voter submitted a Federal Postcard Application; **fwab**, which denotes a voter returned a Federal Write-In Absentee Ballot prior to receiving or requesting a ballot through other means; **informal-request**, which signifies a voter requested a ballot through a less formal process, such as a letter or phone call; **nvra**, which means a voter used a National Voter Registration (Act) form; and **state-application**, which denotes a state form used for ballot requests.

fields.name: BallotRejectionOtherType
fields.title: Other Ballot Rejection Type
fields.description: If BallotRejectionType fails to cover all of the possible ways a ballot may be rejected, this field specifies an alternate reason why the reason the ballot was rejected.

fields.name: BallotRejectionType
fields.title: Ballot Rejection Type
fields.description: Specifies the reason why the ballot was rejected.

fields.name: BallotReturnDate
fields.title: Ballot Returned Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the voter returned the ballot to the local or state election official.

fields.name: BallotReturnOtherType
fields.title: Ballot Return Type
fields.description: If BallotReturnType fails to cover all of the possible return types for a particular voter transaction, this field specifies an alternate method by which the voter returned the ballot to the local or state election official.

fields.name: BallotReturnType
fields.title: Ballot Return Type
fields.description: Specifies the method by which the voter returned the ballot to the local or state election official.

fields.name: BallotTransmissionDate
fields.title: Ballot Transmission Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the local or state election official sent the ballot to the voter.

fields.name: BallotTransmissionOtherType
fields.title: Other Ballot Transmission Type
fields.description: If BallotTransmissionType fails to cover all of the possible transmission types for a particular transaction, this field specifies an alternate method in which the local or state election official sent the ballot to the voter.

fields.name: BallotTransmissionType
fields.title: Ballot Transmission Type
fields.description: Specifies the method in which the ballot was sent to the voter.

fields.name: BallotType
fields.title: Ballot Type
fields.description: Specifies the type of ballot transferred to the voter. Possible values are **absentee**, which is a general catch-all for any type of absentee ballot, **federal**, which denotes the voter only received a ballot that allows voting on federal contests, **full**, which denotes a ballot with all possible contests in the voter's assigned precinct, **fwab**, which specifies a Federal Write-In Absentee Ballot, and **provisional**, which denotes a provisional ballot.

fields.name: ElectionDate
fields.title: Election Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the election took place.

fields.name: ElectionName
fields.title: Election Name
fields.description: Specifies the name of the election.

fields.name: JurisdictionId
fields.title: Jurisdiction Identifier
fields.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the jurisdiction.

fields.name: JurisdictionIdType
fields.title: Jurisdiction Identifier Type
fields.description: Specifies the type of identifier used to identify the jurisdiction in JurisdictionId. Possible values are **local**, which dictates the jurisdiction created the identifier, **fips**, which means the identifier follows the Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code, or **ocd-id**, which means the identifier follows the Open Civic Data Division Identifier (OCDID) standard.

fields.name: JurisdictionName
fields.title: Jurisdiction Name
fields.description: Specifies the name of the jurisdiction in which the voter is registered.

fields.name: StateName
fields.title: State Name
fields.description: Specifies the name of the state in which the voter is registered.

fields.name: VoterMailingCountry
fields.title: Voter's Mailing Country
fields.description: Specifies what country to which the ballot was mailed.

fields.name: VoterType
fields.title: Voter Type
fields.description: Specifies whether the voter is domestic or overseas military (or, if the domestic or overseas designation is unknown, simply whether the voter is military), overseas citizen, or other.

fields.name: WasApplicationRejected
fields.title: Was the Application Rejected
fields.description: Specifies whether the application request was accepted or rejected.
